title: 5 min Yoga Break: Reset & Find Calm
description:
Feeling stressed or anxious? Hit reset with this quick 5 minute Yoga Break to restore your mind & find calm. Use deep belly breathing to relieve tension from your body. Wake up your legs, feet and hamstrings with leg extensions then release the tension in your chest, belly and back in a reclined twist. All in ~5 minutes!  🍑 Try the BAM (Bare A** Minimum) Yoga Challenge: https://www.sarahbethyoga.com/BAM-yoga-challenge

CHAPTERS: 
00:00 5 min Yoga Break
00:10 Lie down & settle in - 5 min Yoga Break
00:35 Breathe deeply - 5 min Yoga Break
02:42 Lower back stretch in wind pose - 5 min Yoga Break
03:14 Hamstring stretch - 5 min Yoga Break
04:02 Relaxing twist - 5 min Yoga Break
05:54 The end - 5 min Yoga Break
06:30 Check out the Bare A** Minimum yoga calendar

channelDescription:
⬇️ Join the FREE BAM Yoga Challenge today! 💙 Welcome to Yoga. Here you'll get free yoga videos to help you stretch, strengthen, tone & de-stress. With color-coded thumbnails, You can find anything you need from:
PINK = Power yoga (workouts)
TEAL = Vinyasa yoga (flows)
BLUE = Hatha yoga (stretches) 
PURPLE = Restorative/Yin yoga (deep stretches)

You can also find exclusive LIVE Yoga classes, a community feature, and a pre-loaded daily yoga calendar in the SarahBethYoga APP.

DON'T FORGET: 
🙏🏽  SUBSCRIBE for new uploads
✨  JOIN ME in the SarahBethYoga APP

Even 5 minutes a day is better for you than 1 hour, once a week. Your daily practice is your strongest practice, and the fastest way to see results in your strength, flexibility, mind & body. 

See you on your mat! 
💙💙💙
Sarah Beth

comments:
Feeling stressed or anxious? Hit reset with this quick 5 minute Yoga Break to restore your mind & find calm. Use deep belly breathing to relieve tension from your body. Wake up your legs, feet and hamstrings with leg extensions then release the tension in your chest, belly and back in a reclined twist. All in ~5 minutes! . 🍑 Try the BAM (Bare A** Minimum) Yoga Challenge: https://www.sarahbethyoga.com/BAM-yoga-challenge

Practice this routine anywhere for a quick mental health break to stretch your body and relieve stress or anxiety.
LOVE the short and non-voice-over format!  Thank you:)
Thank you for this quick session. That did leave me feeling better.💙
